gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 138, Lakers 122
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeat the Lakers, 138-122. Trae Young led the way with 26 points, 13 assists and six 3PM for the Hawks, while Dejounte Murray added 24 points and nine assists in the victory.  Austin Reaves tallied 28 points and six assists for the Lakers, while LeBron James added 20 points, nine rebounds and eight assists in the losing effort. The Hawks improve to 20-27 on the season, while the Lakers fall to 24-25.
